reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, with one noting it's not clingy or too tight, and appreciate its impressive quality and soft fabric with a great texture.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfy
items.body: Loved this so much I bought another in a different color. Nice style, fit and quality making it a good value. The fabric weight is perfect for fall or winter. Read more
items.author: Coleen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute top!
items.body: Love the fit of this shirt! Great quality! The white is not see through . Soft, thick material. Pairs great with leggings! Sized up so that it is long enough to cover my bottom. Learned the hard way that it will shrink significantly if you dry! I just ordered another one! Read more
items.author: Brad

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stretchy And Comfortable. Thumbholes Are Snug.
items.body: I am liking this top's 1/4 zip, the "accordian" texture, and the bold fall color. It seems to hold up to washing with no pilling so that's a plus. It is a good weight for fall...not too heavy in case there is a warm afternoon and not too light if there is a cold snap. The material is stretchy abd comfortable. The one miss for me are the thumbholes. My thumbs fit, but it is snug and uncomfortable. The thumbholes could probably be stretched out, but I don't want stretched out thumbholes weirdly hanging if my thumbs aren't in them. The top still works without the thumbholes so I am okay with it. Read more
items.author: Cal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this top!
items.body: This is a really nice looking top. I got many compliments when I wore it. It is a nice length and is very flattering (not clingy or too tight). I love it so much I got it in three other colors! Read more
items.author: Vicki Vance

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft & Pretty!
items.body: I bought a large for length, I am 5'2" (125lbs). This comes down past my waste around mid thigh. I am glad I bought the large because I like to wear it longer. So if you are taller, take note on length. The back is longer than the front, but not a crazy difference. The fabric is very soft to the touch - super comfy. It does have a texture and is very pretty. This looks like a nicer more high-end looking sweater. It is not thin or too thick. It is not heavy. The fabric for look, texture, softness & comfort is a 5 star in my opinion. You can dress it up or down- great for shopping, lounging or semi-casual work wear. I bought the army green because it was on sale. The color is a very light army green - like a sage green but almost taupe. It does have an intentional hole in the sleeve. I will not wear it that way. The hole is discreet enough that if you do not put your thumb through it, no one would notice it. The cuff texture goes in a different direction, so does the bottom trim. The cuff is longer, I like it that way, but you can also roll up the cuff (hides the thumb slit). It's just about preference. I bought it just under $27 - good price. I will buy more, once the other colors go on sale; they are just under $37 now. I do not know anything about how well it washes or wears yet. Wish there was a way to come back and follow up on here about that since that is what I really want to know. Read more
items.author: Liv

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this shirt
items.body: Love this shirt. Fits well and comfortable. Decent price. Like it so much I’m back to order another in different color. Read more
items.author: Dawn C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and stylish top!
items.body: What a perfect top! Soft and doesn’t itch. perfect length and feels stylish on. I’m 5’4” and 125lbs wearing a small. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: trueluv412

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, cozy, but shrinks in the dyer
items.body: Super cute and cozy. This sweater is pretty light weight but warm. It can be dressed up a bit for business casual or dressed down for cozy at home. My only issue was that it shrunk in the dyer. I'm glad I ordered it a bit big so it still fits. I didn't read instructions and assumed it would be fine which is on me. The fabric is nice and soft! The thumb holes are a little small in my opinion but not so bad that it is uncomfortable. I do love how much extra fabric is left past the holes. It gives a cozy feel. Read more
items.author: Shawna

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Rust, Blue, Army Green, Light Green, Black, Coffee, Light Blue, Wine Red, Almond, Khaki, Pink, White, Yellow. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
